placeholder.TMPCMD: sh -c 'echo TMPJOB was not supposed to run >> TMPLOGSDIR/ERROR.TMPJOB.err'

fetcher.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ cd /TMPDATADIR/TMPALIASDIR && ls -l file_metadata.json && python3 /TMPCODEDIR/fetch_utilities.py file_metadata.json TMPOPTS; } >TMPLOGSDIR/TMPJOB.log 2>&1 '

tabler.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ cd /TMPDATADIR/TMPALIASDIR && python3 /TMPCODEDIR/table_utilities.py TMPCHUNK file_metadata.json TMPOPTS; } >TMPLOGSDIR/TMPJOB.log 2>&1 '

next_step_caller.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ python3 /TMPCODEDIR/setup_utilities.py TMPNEXTSTEP TMPOPTS -p TMPSTART && sleep 3; } >TMPLOGSDIR/TMPJOB.log 2>&1 '
